com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model

Interface ControllerCoach


  • public interface ControllerCoach
    Interface that has to be implemented in order to play the role of a Coach.
    Author:
    Atan

    • Method Detail

      • infoSeePlayerOwn

        void infoSeePlayerOwn(int number,
                    boolean goalie,
                    double x,
                    double y,
                    double deltaX,
                    double deltaY,
                    double bodyAngle,
                    double neckAngle)
        The controller is informed when one of its own players is seen.
        Parameters:
        number - The players uniform number.
        goalie - Is the player a goalie?
        x - The players x coordinate.
        y - The players y coordinate.
        deltaX - The players change of speed on the x plane.
        deltaY - The players change of speed on the y plane.
        bodyAngle - The players body angle.
        neckAngle - The players neck angle.

      • infoSeePlayerOther

        void infoSeePlayerOther(int number,
                      boolean goalie,
                      double x,
                      double y,
                      double deltaX,
                      double deltaY,
                      double bodyAngle,
                      double neckAngle)
        The controller is informed when an opposing player is seen.
        Parameters:
        number - The players uniform number.
        goalie - Is the player a goalie?
        x - The players x coordinate.
        y - The players y coordinate.
        deltaX - The players change of speed on the x plane.
        deltaY - The players change of speed on the y plane.
        bodyAngle - The players body angle.
        neckAngle - The players neck angle.

      • infoSeeGoalOwn

        void infoSeeGoalOwn(double x,
                  double y)
        The controller is informed when its own goal is seen.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the center of the goal.
        y - The y coordinate of the center of the goal.

      • infoSeeGoalOther

        void infoSeeGoalOther(double x,
                    double y)
        The controller is informed when an opposing goal is seen.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the center of the goal.
        y - The y coordinate of the center of the goal.

      • infoSeeBall

        void infoSeeBall(double x,
               double y,
               double deltaX,
               double deltaY)
        The controller is informed that the Ball is in sight.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the ball.
        y - The y coordinate of the ball.
        deltaX - The balls change in speed on the x plane.
        deltaY - The balls change in speed on the y plane.

      • infoHearTeamNames

        void infoHearTeamNames(String teamWest,
                     String teamEast)
        The controller is informed of the connected teams names. Empty string if no team connected.
        Parameters:
        teamWest - The name of the west team.
        teamEast - The name of the east team.

      • infoHearReferee

        void infoHearReferee(RefereeMessage refereeMessage)
        The observer is informed when a referee message is broadcast.
        Parameters:
        refereeMessage - possible values: FOUL_OWN, FOUL_OTHER, HALF_TIME, TIME_UP, TIME_UP_WITHOUT_A_TEAM, TIME_EXTENDED, DROP_BALL, OFFSIDE_OWN, OFFSIDE_OTHER

      • infoHearPlayMode

        void infoHearPlayMode(PlayMode playMode)
        The observer is informed when a play mode message is broadcast.
        Parameters:
        playMode - possible values: BEFORE_KICK_OFF, TIME_OVER, PLAY_ON, KICK_OFF_OWN, KICK_OFF_OTHER, FREE_KICK_OWN, FREE_KICK_OTHER, GOAL_KICK_OWN, CORNER_KICK_OTHER, GOAL_KICK_OWN, GOAL_KICK_OTHER, GOAL_OWN, GOAL_OTHER

      • infoHearPlayer

        void infoHearPlayer(double direction,
                  String message)
        The controller is informed when it hears a message from another player.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction from which the message originated.
        message - The actual message said.

      • infoHearError

        void infoHearError(Errors error)
        The coach is informed when it hears an error message.
        Parameters:
        error - The error to handle

        The coach is informed when it hears an OK message.
        Parameters:

                   double playerDecayDeltaMin,
                   double playerTypes,
                   double ptMax,
                   double randomSeed,
                   double staminaIncMaxDeltaFactor,
                   double subsMax)

        staminaIncMaxDeltaFactor - a double.
